mapper.select: SELECT tm.`MESSAGE_ID` AS MessageId, tm.`MESSAGE_TYPE` AS messageType, tm.`MESSAGE_TITLE` AS messageTitle, tm.`MESSAGE_CONTENT` AS messageContent, tm.`ADD_TIME` AS addTime, tm.`CREATOR` AS creator, tm.`MOD_TIME` AS modTime, tm.`UPDATER` AS updater, tm.`MESSAGE_VISITS` AS messageVisits, tm.`IS_DELETE` AS isDelete FROM t_message tm where tm.`IS_DELETE` = 0 ORDER BY ADD_TIME DESC
